item.title: Getting Started with QGIS
item.description: In this post we will learn following skills Launching QGIS Loading Raster and Vector Layers Saving Projects Understanding the QGIS User Interface Download all data from : All Resource for Workshop Launch QGIS Use Dashboard or QGIS icon to Launch QGIS. To close use can use X icon or Project Menu and Exit QGIS option When you start QGIS it will open following user interface The QGIS GUI is divided into five components:

item.title: How to Install QGIS in Ubuntu
item.description: Install QGIS in Ubuntu QGIS woks on following platforms Linux Windows Mac OS X The download all above versions at https://qgis.org/en/site/forusers/download.html this link. To add repositories into the sources.list file use following command $ sudo gedit /etc/apt/sources.list To install QGIS using ppa on Ubuntu 18.04, Use following repositories to /etc/apt/sources.list deb https://qgis.org/ubuntugis bionic main deb-src https://qgis.org/ubuntugis bionic main To install QGIS using ppa on Ubuntu 16.

item.title: Workshop on QGIS
item.description: Welcome to the QGIS workshop training, Here we will be covering following topics Problem Statement Using QGIS for Mithi River Analysis Features of QGIS Installation of QGIS Getting Started with QGIS
